${modID}:Sentimental Locket.NAME: Sentimental Locket
${modID}:Sentimental Locket.FLAVOR: The locket helps you remember your mission.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yMemory into your hand.

${modID}:Ring of Keys.NAME: Ring of Keys
${modID}:Ring of Keys.FLAVOR: Unlock the ideas contained within your mind.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw 1 additional card for each Innate or Bottled card in your deck.

${modID}:Hardwood Barrel.NAME: Hardwood Barrel
${modID}:Hardwood Barrel.FLAVOR: Nice to have until you're scraping the bottom of it.                      Designed by u/Charrat
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn until you shuffle your draw pile.

${modID}:Reality Box.NAME: Reality Box
${modID}:Reality Box.FLAVOR: The reality within the box holds a great power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is created during combat, Upgrade it.

${modID}:Establishing Seal.NAME: Establishing Seal
${modID}:Establishing Seal.FLAVOR: Seal your fate and reveal your path into the future.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is #yRetained, reduce its cost by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Darkstone Doll.NAME: Darkstone Doll
${modID}:Darkstone Doll.FLAVOR: This charm draws power from a mysterious doll, converting its malicious energy into strength and vitality to the wearer.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you obtain a #rCurse, increase your Max HP by #b
For each #rCurse in your deck, start each combat with #b

${modID}:Small House.NAME: Small House
${modID}:Small House.FLAVOR: "A near perfect implementation of miniaturization. My finest work to date, but still not adequate." - The Architect
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain #b1 potion. NL Gain #b
#yGold. NL Raise your Max HP by #b
. NL Obtain #b1 common relic. NL Obtain #b1 card. NL Upgrade #b1 random card.

${modID}:Ceramic Fish.NAME: Ceramic Fish
${modID}:Ceramic Fish.FLAVOR: Meticulously painted, these fish were revered to bring great fortune.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain #b
#yGold. No longer works when you skip a card reward.
